data.eml:eml: A new species of the leafhopper genus Neoreticulum Dai in China (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae), with a key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dai, Ren-Huai, Xing, Ji-Chun, Li, Zi-Zhong (2012): A new species of the leafhopper genus Neoreticulum Dai in China (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae), with a key to species. Zootaxa 3180: 57-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214906
